LanguageData.AllTheFish.DeepWaterFishing: Must be placed over deep water
LanguageData.AllTheFish.CloseFishing: Cannot be placed so close to another fishing spot
LanguageData.AllTheFish.TooSmallFishing: Must be placed in a larger water source
LanguageData.AllTheFish.MinFishingRadiusSettingDescri: Sets the minimum distance between fishing spots
LanguageData.AllTheFish.MinFishingSizeSettingDescript: Sets the minimum number of water tiles required to be able to fish
LanguageData.AllTheFish.FishingWorkCostSettingDescrip: Worker cost for fishing a single fish out of the water
